name: Math Draw
tagline: ASCII drawing tool using a math formula.
body:
#Math Draw This is an ASCII drawing tool using a math formula.
The formula can take 2 variables (i and j) and use the basic math operations.

You can also change the random ASCII char modifier and the size of the ASCII image.
![ScreenShot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Evenflow/mathdraw/master/Screenshots/screenshot6.png)
